text:
Even on a celeb-studded red carpet at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards, heads were turned by the surprise presence of pop star Taylor Swift. Taylor showed up in a dramatic blush-colored gown, with slit detail and feather embellishments.

Swift is not an announced performer or presenter at the Billboard Music Awards, but rumors began to circulate earlier on Sunday (May 20) she might be appearing at the show, either as a presenter or a performer — which have only been further stoked by her red carpet appearance.

Explore Explore Taylor Swift See latest videos, charts and news See latest videos, charts and news

Related Here Are All the Winners From the 2018 Billboard Music Awards

Taylor Swift is nominated for five awards at this year’s BBMAs: top artist, top female artist, top Billboard 200 artist, top Billboard 200 album and top selling album, the latter two for her mutli-Platinum-certified 2017 set Reputation.
